{"step_by_step_thinking": "Pimavanserin is an atypical antipsychotic medication. It is used for the treatment of Parkinson's disease psychosis and is not classified as a typical antipsychotic. Typical antipsychotics are older medications and include drugs like haloperidol and chlorpromazine. Pimavanserin, on the other hand, is a newer generation antipsychotic.", "answer_choice": "B. no"}
